_header: My years be young even as ye see
_description: A girl’s expression of love by Thomas Wyatt — six 5-line stanzas (aaaab) including refrain: ‘Yf yt ware not’, and 2-line burden: ‘Grudge on who liste this ys my lott / Nothing to want if it ware not’

BLAdd17492.First Lines:
my yeris be yong even as ye seeall thingis thereto doth well
                    agre…
BLAdd17492.Last Lines:
…yet take this note before your eyesmy mirth ff[ ? ] doble ous
                    er [? ] wise
